name: NFTetris
description:
Realizing the environmental impact of NFTs, you become a vigilante whose mission it is to remove as many NFTs as you can by stealing NFTs from Bit, a startup aiming to become the eBay of NFTs.

Use ←→ or AD to move the tetrominos left or right, ↑↓ or WS to rotate and Space to drop faster.

You can also play this game in a web browser. All you need to do is go here.
